mapper.select: select c.id as id ,c.user_id as userId,c.identity_card_image_url as identityCardImageUrl , c.image_url as imageUrl,c.status as status,u.name as name,r.role_name rolename,r.id as roleId from user u , cardimage c,user_role ur,role r where u.id=c.user_id and u.id=ur.user_id and ur.role_id=r.id
mapper.update: update cardimage set status=#{i} where id=#{id}
